name: That Damn Hospital
description:
Tempted by some teenagers, an eight-year-old boy decides to enter an abandoned hospital for an hour for $50. Will he make it out of that damn hospital alive?

Any bug that you find you can comment on it to try to fix it

A game developed by amumis in rpg maker mz for the 4th RPG Maker Horror Game Jam

Update V1.1:

Fixed a few bugs

Improved introduction

fixed spelling errors (I hope)
